import React from "react"; import img1 from './1.jpg' export const RightTop = () => { const [myIcon, setMyIcon] = useState('material-icons-sharp') const [isLightActive, setIsLightActive] = useState(true) const [isDarkActive, setIsDarkActive] = useState(false) const [cls, setCls] = useState(); // class of aside in media Query (for mobile) whether the menu is displayed or closed return(
setTheme('lightmode') + setIsLightActive(true) + setIsDarkActive(false)}>light_mode setTheme('darkmode') + setIsDarkActive(true) + setIsLightActive(false)}>dark_mode

Hey, Hatim

) }
